source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Basic abstract art! Depiction of humankind...
items.headline: abstract painting of buddha for your home decor
objectives_summary: Through this course u can simply make abstract paintings at home with very basic equipments and these paintings will perfectly add on to your home decor. ○this course includes an abstract buddha painting which represents to the world the warm and the cold sides of homo sapiens with the colour texture and synchronisation of the painting... Also learners with be objectified with the skilfull technique of painting with different brushes as per their hair type size and product consistency. Along with the right choice of contrasting paints accompanied with better consistency of their colors while painting. Students will also learn how to merge shades into one another in the painting as well as over their palettes

items.title: "Stars and Stripes" Pattern Quilt Top: From Start to Finish
items.headline: Learn to quilt by making a fun, patriotic or night sky themed quilt top!
objectives_summary: You will finish this course having made an entire heirloom quilt top.
Quilting is easy and straightforward if you follow the simple steps.
Tips and Tricks that you won’t get anywhere else!

items.title: How To Crochet Recycled Materials
items.headline: Your Step By Step Guide To Crocheting Recycled Materials
objectives_summary: How To Crochet Recycled Materials

items.title: Learn 4 easy CUTE artworks - Procreate digital illustration
items.headline: Procreate made easy with step by step encouragement. Digital illustration has never been more fun,make digital art today
objectives_summary: How to make 4 digital illustrations using procreate
You will understand how to use Procreate's powerful art tools.
You will learn a workflow, step-by-step, that works for many digital illustrations in Procreate

items.title: Learn to paint watercolor beaches | Painting easy seascapes
items.headline: Learn some beginner watercolor techniques and learn to paint 3 different watercolor beaches and seascapes with me !
objectives_summary: Watercolor basics guide
How to make different beach color shades
Painting Watercolor Beaches

items.title: Watercolor Painting: Venice Landscape
items.headline: Learn how to draw and paint beautiful Venice landscapes
objectives_summary: Materials - what paints, paper, brushes and pens you will need
The correct use of values in painting
How to sketch a subject easily by simplifying a landscape into basic shapes

items.title: Portrait sketching easy. Full face and profile view
items.headline: An easy way for everybody to draw recognizable portraits in full face and profile view
objectives_summary: You'll get all information and skills to draw recognizable portraits in two main positions: full face and profile view

items.title: 10 Amazing Magic Tricks To Impress Anyone
items.headline: Learn In Detail 10 Impressive Magic Tricks Along With Useful Card Manipulation Techniques & Other Cool Showoff Moves
objectives_summary: Amazing magic tricks to impress your family, friends or anyone
Ranging from simple tricks to more challenging ones but really impressive
Card tricks, coin tricks, ring tricks and more

items.title: Tropical Fruit Series: WATERMELONS [course 1] in Watercolor
items.headline: Paint cute fruit postcards while practicing main watercolor techniques.
objectives_summary: How to select art materials for a fruity painting.
How to draw shapes of watermelons.
How to mix colors to achieve the best color combinations to paint a watermelon.

items.title: Learn How to Crochet a Crop Top Step by Step
items.headline: Push your crochet skills to the next level and learn to crochet your own crochet crop top.
objectives_summary: To crochet a crop top from start to finish in your preferrd size (Small, Medium, Large)
Why crochet gauge is important and how to make a gauge swatch.
To crochet on both sides of a foundation chain, to crochet down the side of stitches and how to connect crochet motifs.

items.title: Watercolor for beginner artists
items.headline: the basics of watercolor art
objectives_summary: learning the fundamentals of watercolor painting
improving painting skills
learning to create impressive artwork

items.title: Creación de personaje
items.headline: Aprende herramientas que te servirán para el resto de tu carrera como actor/actriz.
objectives_summary: Creación de personaje en la actuación

items.title: Cinque Terre in Watercolor: Complexity to Loose Painting
items.headline: Turn a simple and effective way to reduce a complex reference picture to a loose, impressionistic painting.
objectives_summary: Using essential watercolor techniques such as wet-in-wet and wet-on-dry
Turn a simple and effective way to reduce a complex reference picture to a loose, impressionistic painting.
Learn how to paint buildings, water and boats

items.title: Learn Loose Watercolor Painting: Boats and Water
items.headline: Paint FIVE different boat and watercolor scenes! Learn essential techniques and secrets to painting loosely.
objectives_summary: Create stunning contrast through the correct use of values in painting
Using essential watercolour techniques such as wet-in-wet and wet-on-dry
Applying the above techniques to paint skies, clouds, water.

items.title: Mixed Media Mountain Landscape
items.headline: Learn to combine watercolour, acrylic paint and drywall compound to achieve rich texture and depth in your artwork!
objectives_summary: You will learn to use a combination of pencil sketching, watercolour painting, drywall compound and acrylic paint to create a beautifully textured mountain landscape. You can apply these techniques to any type of landscape painting after completing this course.
You will have the opportunity to use unique tools such as palette knives and toothpicks for creating texture. It's kind of like spreading icing on a cupcake!
You will learn to apply the concepts of perspective, scale, distance, background, mid-ground and foreground.

items.title: Drawing Dogs: Basic Techniques to Improve Your Illustrations
items.headline: Learn to draw the dog figure step-by-step with these easy lessons
objectives_summary: How to observe the dog
How to draw a dog by using simple shapes
How to draw the bone structure of the dog
